extendedInfo.description: ** IF YOU ENJOY THIS APP PLEASE CHECK OUT MY NEWLY RELEASED CONVERT EVERYTHING APP  **** An ad-free version is also available **Financial calculators for JB+. Over 140 calculators w/ formulas currently with more on the way. Includes usage tracking and time of last use. reviews.title: Interesting app
reviews.comment: Please ad a \'clear button\' option.... so we don\'t have to X-out every # to do new calculations.  The \'refresh\' button has limited ability!    Regarding \"Days In Inventory \" shouldn\'t the equation consist of \'date into inventory\', \'day it left inventory\' in order to figure the \'days IN inventory!?   The items price should have no bearing on the days in inventory...   Like app, just trying to help perfect it.  Thanks
reviews.author: Kelli Hillman

reviews.title: The best financial calculator
reviews.comment: So many features, and the dev is adding more all the time.
reviews.author: Gregory Szucs
